mainText:
I have only worked for Apple for one year, but everyday I am blown away 
by this company. Steve has done so much for this world..and so much for 
me. It's not just about the amazing technology, but this new Family that 
I have. "Thank You" dosen't seem to say enough but right now its all I 
have.

Thank You!

We'll miss you every day
header: So much in so little time
author: Kristen
